original_text:
He will be a holy place;
    for both Israel and Judah he will be
a stone that causes people to stumble
    and a rock that makes them fall.
And for the people of Jerusalem he will be
    a trap and a snare.
korean_text: 그가 성소가 되시리라 그러나 이스라엘의 두 집에는 걸림돌과 걸려 넘어지는 반석이 되실 것이며 예루살렘 주민에게는 함정과 올무가 되시리니

sentences.original_text: He will be a holy place;
for both Israel and Judah he will be
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘과 유다를 위해 그는 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: a stone that causes people to stumble
and a rock that makes them fall.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 넘어지게 하는 바위가 되리라

sentences.original_text: And for the people of Jerusalem
he will be a trap and a snare.
